overview: In 2008, I (Director), setting up a tent near the shore, started shooting the scene of Naeseong stream noticeably changed due to so-called The Four River Governmental Project. The natural circulation carrying the energy of living creatures for the last 100 million years suddenly cut off. Even worse, the sands shining like a gold, which once renowned as the rare beauty in the world, became desolated simply with dark pebbles.
title: Following Sand River
